channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 在因贸易限制和网络攻击指控而导致双边关系持续紧张之际，习近平主席在北京会见了一批美国企业高管。
item.description:
President Xi Jinping has met with a group of American business executives in Beijing as bilateral tensions continue to rise over trade restrictions and accusations of cyberattacks. https://t.co/YBbSE2yINU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已跃居世界首富行列--然而，他的法律纠纷却让这位美国共和党（GOP）推定提名人和破产老手面临有史以来最大规模的现金催收
item.description:
NEW: Donald Trump has jumped the ranks of the world’s richest — yet his legal woes have the presumptive GOP nominee and veteran of bankruptcies facing his biggest-ever cash call https://t.co/9URcE7U373

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：日元兑美元汇率跌至 1990 年以来最低点
item.description:
BREAKING: The yen plunges to its lowest against the US dollar since 1990 https://t.co/VAv0LWHGmo pic.twitter.com/ssw9zo282u

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所位于新加坡的仓库迎来了创纪录的铅交货量，这凸显了新加坡正在成为过剩工业金属的倾销地。
item.description:
A record delivery of lead into London Metal Exchange warehouses in Singapore has underscored the city state’s emergence as a dumping ground for surplus industrial metals https://t.co/pI5D37C7Uj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 日元兑美元汇率跌至约 34 年来的最弱水平，令市场猜测日本将加大力度减缓日元汇率的跌势
item.description:
The yen slid to weakest level in about 34 years against the dollar, fanning speculation that Japan will step up its effort to slow the decline https://t.co/LIP1HAp4do

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 泰国市场的复兴并没有到来。泰国基准股指将迎来第五个季度的下跌，外国资金正在撤退。
item.description:
A market revival for Thailand just isn’t coming. Its benchmark stock index is set for its fifth quarterly decline, and foreign funds are retreating https://t.co/fKDzAUyCMM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 周二的塌桥事故造成巴尔的摩港关闭，一条主要公路也被封闭，这将导致大西洋中部地区数周或数月的运输中断，并加速货物向美国西海岸的转移。
item.description:
The bridge collapse Tuesday that shut the Port of Baltimore and closed a major highway will cause weeks or months of transportation disruptions in the Mid-Atlantic region and accelerate a shift of cargo to the US West Coast https://t.co/V7NgshrrcV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 一位鹰派日本央行董事表示希望逐步继续加息
item.description:
A hawkish BOJ board member signaled his desire to gradually keep raising interest rates https://t.co/Ji0MVjA2ej

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 近 30 亿美元的美元-日元期权即将到期，这令交易员们提心吊胆，因为日本货币正徘徊在可能引发政府干预的水平边缘
item.description:
The imminent expiry of nearly $3 billion in dollar-yen options has traders on edge as the Japanese currency teeters on the brink of levels that might trigger government intervention https://t.co/MxbSqxlvoj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 今年前两个月，中国工业企业利润增长，经济出现积极迹象
item.description:
Profits at China’s industrial companies increased in the first two months of the year, adding to positive signs in the economy https://t.co/QrRqFjr2Ia

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 以下是中国年度博鳌论坛的最新消息，政府官员和企业高管预计将讨论从人工智能治理到地缘政治紧张局势等话题
item.description:
Here's the latest from China’s annual Boao Forum, with government officials and corporate executives expected to discuss topics from governance of AI to geopolitical tensions https://t.co/kahZABK5h4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 一个商业游说团体表示，中国政府 "非常接近 "取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒进口征收的高额关税。
item.description:
The Chinese government is “very close” to lifting the heavy tariffs on Australian wine imports, a business lobby said https://t.co/ZbMGtnmefa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 与前总统唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体初创公司对赌，是市场上最困难、最昂贵的空头交易之一
item.description:

item.title: 巴西亿万富翁兄弟乔斯利和韦斯利-巴蒂斯塔被任命为 JBS 董事会成员，为他们在大规模腐败丑闻后重返家族肉类帝国铺平了道路。
item.description:
Brazilian billionaire brothers Joesley and Wesley Batista were named to the board of JBS, paving the way for their return to the family’s meat empire after a massive corruption scandal https://t.co/pGfsJzhS6F

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 新西兰今年将继续减税，即使经济停滞会减少政府收入
item.description:
New Zealand will press ahead with tax cuts this year even as the stagnant economy curbs government revenue https://t.co/Pp6HEmjWzx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀率连续第三个月保持稳定，支持储备银行将利率维持在 12 年高位不变的决定
item.description:
Australian inflation was steady for a third straight month, supporting the Reserve Bank’s decision to keep interest rates unchanged at a 12-year high https://t.co/T7PnTpBMEh

item.title: 爱尔兰经济与社会研究所（Economic and Social Research Institute）表示，爱尔兰的经济前景正在改善，这要归功于国内持续的抗通胀能力。
item.description:
Ireland’s economic outlook is improving thanks to continued resilience at home as inflation eases, the Economic and Social Research Institute said https://t.co/zlpyKTn06Z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 即使抵押贷款利率翻了一番多，在伦敦拥有房产仍然比租房更划算
item.description:
Owning property in London remains better value than renting, even after mortgage rates more than doubled https://t.co/k3K8IWghhW

item.title: S&P 将五家地区性贷款机构的评级展望从 "稳定 "下调至 "负面"，理由是商业房地产贷款的风险敞口
item.description:
S&P lowered its outlook on five regional lenders to negative from stable, citing exposure to commercial real estate loans https://t.co/uEoIPJsug4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 27, 2024

item.title: 美国汽车供应链将因巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的垮塌而中断，这对仍在从与大流行病相关的挫折中恢复的美国汽车生态系统造成了又一次打击。
item.description:
The US automotive supply chain will be disrupted by the collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore, dealing another blow to America’s automotive ecosystem still recovering from pandemic-related setbacks. https://t.co/jYPiucZWf8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱计划在未来几个月内解雇 7 万名政府工作人员，这是他不惜一切代价在今年实现财政平衡的战略的一部分。
item.description:
Argentine President Javier Milei plans to fire 70,000 government workers in the coming months as part of his strategy to reach a fiscal balance at any cost this year https://t.co/QaxNtcgKmI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据中国官方数据显示，今年前两个月，中国对欧盟国家的电动汽车出口下降了近五分之一，原因是布鲁塞尔正在调查对电动汽车行业的不公平补贴。
item.description:
China’s exports of EVs to European Union countries dropped by nearly a fifth during the first two months of the year, according to official Chinese data, amid a probe by Brussels into unfair subsidies of the industry https://t.co/4oipYDf5kv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥顷刻间倒塌，但灾难性后果将延续数周之久
item.description:
Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed in a matter of seconds, but the catastrophic consequences are set to stretch out for weeks https://t.co/y7TsDqJdlc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: #5Things：巴尔的摩主要桥梁坍塌，航运交通中断。阿里巴巴再次取消 IPO。meme股卷土重来。市场动向
item.description:
#5Things: Major bridge in Baltimore collapses, halting shipping traffic. Alibaba calls off another IPO. The meme stock crowd makes a comeback. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/0dxuFhu7v2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 贝莱德的拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）在警告美国即将面临退休危机后表示，美国应向澳大利亚的养老金体系寻求解决方案。
item.description:
BlackRock’s Larry Fink says the US should look to Australia’s pensions system for solutions after he warned of a looming retirement crisis https://t.co/eHXEIjU917

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024

item.title: 青山集团的电池业务部门计划在印尼建厂，此举将有助于印尼从商品生产向利润更丰厚的加工和制造领域迈进。
item.description:
The battery unit of Tsingshan plans to build a plant in Indonesia, in a move that will help the nation step up from commodities production to more lucrative processing and manufacturing https://t.co/aRR7tDBj5S

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 26, 2024
